title: Summarize a champions lore in 2 sentences or less!
body:
{{champion:268}}:

Was the emperor of Shurima. And he still is.

Wants to find a rock. Doesnt.

{{champion:24}} The League attempted to nerf him for beating down everyone.  He dodged the nerfbat and beat down Morello.

He spun. Then he won.
{{champion:55}} Then she came. Spun and she won
Nice try, Riot lore team!

{{champion:154}} - Zac is the product of a Zaun experiment to manufacture a hexchem-engineered supersoldier - the Zaun Amorphous Combatant - to combine brute strength with limitless flexibility to become a weapon that can regenerate after receiving substantial damage in the field of combat. Originally built to destroy, the enemy that wanted to use him for evil abducted his parents and held them hostage and threatened to kill them, but Zac unleashed every ounce of his raw energy and mass for the very first time, subduing his parents' captors sending the laboratory's workers fleeing and brought his loved ones home and now   he now protects the innocent and the helpless.

2 sentences?

Skarner, the crystalline guardian, defends the entrance to a realm deep beneath the shuriman wastes. The few who survive trespassing his domain describe a creature of terrifying intelligence, anger, and precision. What this merciless creature protects, no one knows.

The mysteries that surround Rammus are numerous such as, how did a simple creature of the desert suddenly become able to reason and how did he craft his vaunted suit of armor or, what is he searching for as he crosses the Shuriman desert? One thing is for certain: trying to stop the inexorable Rammus is a fool's mission.
